data.text: @AaronBastani @FT Pakistan continued diplomatic trip.India looking at alternate rupee payment system to bypass sanctions & continue trade. (Russia supplies India with 60% of military hardware+missile defence system, relies on Russian fertiliser - affect Indian farming industry). New world order

@AaronBastani @FT different reactions from East & West. Outright condemnation has been very limited from countries to the East. Several have taken a slightly anti-US stance including India which is surprising.
